title: American Horror Story Season 8 News: WE'RE GETTING THE THEME TONIGHT!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: You’re so cute freaking out over the theme
I’m having a bad vibe about all the early releases for the upcoming season. I personally think it’s all to throw us off from what the actual plot will be.
It better be the freakin theme because I'm staying up till after 3 for this. As much as I love teasers, i will be very upset if I have to stay up for that. It better be the theme 😂
😮😮😮🤣🤣🤣🤣Mary I cannot wait!! OMG!! Soooo Freaking EXCITED!!🤗🤗🤗😄😄😄😄
